knimeNode.name: Table To Variable
knimeNode.shortDescription: Defines new flow variables based on row of input table.

fullDescription.intro: This node uses a single row of a data table to define new flow variables. The names of the variables are defined by the column names and the variable assignments (i.e. the values) are given by the values in the row. The variables are merged into the flow, which is passed-through this node.

ports.dataIn: Port object being passed on to output port.
The table whose first(!) row will constitute variables' values.
ports.dataOut: The unaltered input connection object (first input port)
